prompts.prompt: I need to create an app using Microsoft PowerApps that allows for the distribution of tasks to employees within a company. The app should enable managers to create, assign, and monitor tasks for their team members. It should have a user-friendly interface where managers can input task details like title, description, due date, and assigned employee. Employees should receive notifications when a new task is assigned to them and be able to update the status of the task. The app should also have a dashboard for tracking the progress of tasks and generating reports. Please provide the steps and code needed to build this app in PowerApps.
